name: The HD Adventures of Rotating Octopus Character
name_original: The HD Adventures of Rotating Octopus Character
description:
The HD Adventures of Rotating Octopus Character is a vibrant, joyful remaster of the popular PlayStation®Portable game. Recreated in high-definition with PlayStation®Vita system exclusive features, this is the definitive version of one of 2011's highest rated PlayStation®Portable games.
Vita exclusive features: Trophies, Leaderboards, beautiful new HD graphics and balance tuning.

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
Network Features
1024KB Minimum

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
